original_title: 7 Spirits at the Halloween Midnight Circus
overview: When the moonlight dims and the night grows dark, the clock strikes the witching hour in our dream amusement park. Step into the world of fantasy and imagination on the night before Hallow's Eve for a 7 star musical constellation in a thrilling show you won't believe.  DREAMCATCHER is getting your Halloween started with an online concert! They are holding their 4th online concert called "HALLOWEEN MIDNIGHT CIRCUS" with a carnival theme that promises a lot of fun!
title: 7 Spirits at the Halloween Midnight Circus
